overview:
Greg Cox is the CEO of Quintessential Finance Group as well as owning his own private investment business which specialises in investing in and supporting finance and payments focused technology startups.

He has in recent years established Quintessential as the market leader in the UK online consumer loan & finance sector. The Group owns various subsidiaries all originating customers online through direct marketing and large affiliate networks as well as comparison sites. Trading activities include: Personal & unsecured loans, Payday Loans, Micro Loans, Secured Loans, Debt Management and help and various insurance products.

An entrepreneur with over 12 years’ experience in running his own companies from start-up to Â£60m turnover. Operated in varying industries including automotive, private equity, property and financial services, which is now Greg’s focus and sector of choice.
